projectinfo.description: The village doctor had said it was the Burning Sickness. His beloved was always the first to help anyone in need, and soon it spread to their daughter. Sick in her bed, the hero's child asked for her favorite fable, the one about an Ice Flower deep in a cave up in the Sacred Mountains. It was said to heal any burns and wounds. With nothing but hope, the hero went into the mountains in search of this flower. Almost out of food and hope, he found a strange cave. As he ventured deep into the cave, he found a dead plant. Now, shivering with cold, the hero looks around at the ice and gets an idea...
